author: Garycrx
title: Outstanding Hotel located on the 5th Ave of Rome.
text:
The Inn at the Spanish Steps is nestled between Cartier and Prada. Itâ€™s an upscale neighborhood with plenty of great window shopping for sure. I was there a few days before Christmas and Prada was serving Champagne to customers waiting for admission. The hotel staff was wonderful and always helpful. The complimentary breakfast was outstanding and the room was well appointed. Another winner picked with the help of Trip Advisor. Thanks all.
